{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=RE4100W |revision= |asin=B00SSSCAZE |newegg=2WG-002F-00001 |price=79.99 |fcc_date=01/16/2015 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WST-880L |manuf_rev=N02 R0.4 |availability=common |type=range extender, audio streamer |fcc_id=Q87-RE4100W |ic_id=3839A-RE4100W |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz= |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628AN;MT7628AN, 1437-AJCSL, DAP07007; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQH-25H |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628AN;MT7628AN, 1437-AJCSL, DAP07007; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5592;RT5592N, TNMF740A09, 14328TA1; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=LinksysExtenderXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^LinksysExtender[0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE4100W/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=RE4100W|pid=01t80000003fjTyAAI}} "0500-2140421200" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Linksys|U-MEDIA}} {{WiFiCert|WFA56813|12/08/2014}} :The WFA certification indicates this device is using '''Linux'''. ===Additional support=== *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=136673 Getting to know the Linksys N600 Pro Wi-Fi Range Extender, RE4100W] *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=143720 Using the Linksys Range Extenders, RE6700, RE4100W, RE6500 and RE6500HG wireless music playback feature] ===See also=== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
[[List of Linksys Wireless Devices#Repeaters/Range Extenders|Repeaters/Range Extenders]] *[[Linksys RE1000]] N300 Wi-Fi Range Extender *[[Linksys RE2000]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE2000 v2]] Wireless-N Range Extender *[[Linksys RE3000W]] N300 Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE4000W]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE4100W]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500]] AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500HG]] AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6700]] AC1200 AMPLIFY Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender __NOTOC__
